name: Darth_Kroan
content:
Darth Kroan was a humanoid male Sith Lord who was active during the reign of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire, between 130 ABY and 138 ABY. Kroan had yellow eyes, gray skin, and a bald head.
Kroan wore a golden breathing apparatus over his nose. He was clothed in a long black cloak with golden accents and adornments lining the shoulders of it. The cloak had a high collar that stretched just above Kroan's head. The outfit was paired with multiple golden necklaces that were worn around Kroan's neck.
Darth Kroan is a character created for Red Fly Studio's video game Battle of the Sith Lords. Kroan's design was created by concept artist Thomas A. Szakolczay at some point prior to the game's cancellation in 2011.
